room1.description: This room is ideally suited for solo travelers in pursuit of both comfort and affordability. It features a single bed with a high-quality, regular mattress, ensuring a restful nights sleep while remaining budget-conscious.

room2.description: Suitable and recommended for business travelers that is looking for comfortable stay. This room has one queen-sized bed, a table paired with comfortable and adjustable chair on which a business person can use when working. Also, this room has mini fridge that can be used to store foods and drinks.

room3.description: This well-appointed room features two spacious queen-sized beds, each accommodating two adults, making it an excellent choice for family vacations. Additionally, it offers a generously sized work desk and an adjustable chair, providing valuable amenities for discerning business travelers. All of these amenities are available at a highly competitive and affordable rate, ensuring a comfortable and cost-effective stay.

room4.description: Ideal for more comfortable stay, room with king-sized bed equipped with Hypnos mattresses and Egyptian cotton sheets. This room also has working table paired with comfortable chair with modern design.

room5.description: This room features two single beds furnished with Emma Mattresses to guarantee a restful and comfortable sleep. Additionally, a functional worktable is provided, and guests can enjoy scenic views of the hotels surroundings.
